manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description:
DarkMonkey Theme

This is a Fonts/Colors and LookAndFeel combo that utilizes James McFadden's Obsidian Fonts/Colorsand Nilo Gonzalez's Nimrod LookAndFeel which isbased on the Metal LookAndFeel. This module just checks and sees if the user already has the components, and if not, installs the theme and activates a few options:

  • under Tools - Options - Appearance - LookAndFeel it will have "DarkMonkey" , available.
  • It also adds a Fonts/Colors Profile called "Dark Monkey".

We hope you like it!

For More Information visit: DarkMonkey Development Thread
